### Problem 1

Loading homicide data and adjusting `report_date` variable

```{r, message = FALSE}
homicide = 
  read_csv("./data/homicide-data.csv") %>% 
  separate(reported_date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = c(4, 6))

view(homicide)
```

The `homicide` dataset has `r nrow(homicide)` rows and `r ncol(homicide)` columns with data on homicides in 50 large U.S. cities gathered be _The Washington Post_ from `r min(pull(homicide, year))` to `r max(pull(homicide, year))`.
